word: Satan was trying to compass their destruction. . . . They made a faithful study of the Word of God, that they might know the divine will. By faith they believed that the One whom they served would communicate to them His will, and in answer to their faith God opened His Word to them. . . . They made the Word of God their textbook, looking upon it as the foundation upon which they must build character. They had only the Old Testament. . . .
